title: Power cuts to continue tomorrow: PUCSL
body_lines: The electricity regulator the Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) yesterday approved power cuts as requested by the Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB).
For areas P, Q, R, S, T, U, V and W two hours and 15 minutes from 8:30 a.m. to 5:30 p.m. and 1 hour and 50 minutes from 5:30 p.m. to 11 p.m.
Areas A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J, K and L three hours and 20 minutes from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. and one hour and 40 minutes from 6 p.m. to 11 p.m.
